name: Astronautica (Kilthunox)
description:
Astronautica is an isometric pixel art space survival game where you play as a solo astronaut to complete various missions on distant asteroids.

This game is a game jam submission for Godot Wild Jam #53. It surely has bugs, typos, and other undiscovered issues at the time of release.

https://godotwildjam.com/

Font used: Omelette Font: https://mxashlynn.itch.io/gb-studio-omelette-font
